definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
one who is not prepared to risk his child will never catch the wolf (proverb)/(fig.) one who is unwilling to take risks will not achieve great things
pinyin: she3 bu4 de5 hai2 zi5 tao4 bu4 zhu4 lang2

definition: lit. a child who cries gets to feed at the breast (idiom)/fig. the squeaky wheel gets the grease
pinyin: hui4 ku1 de5 hai2 zi5 you3 nai3 chi1

definition: lit. the child who cries gets the candy (idiom)/fig. the squeaky wheel gets the grease
pinyin: hui4 ku1 de5 hai2 zi5 you3 tang2 chi1

definition: wife, kids and a warm bed (idiom)/the simple and good life
pinyin: lao3 po2 hai2 zi5 re4 kang4 tou5

sentences.english: The children are playing under the tree.
You must prevent the children from touching the dangerous things.
sentences.chinese: 你們務必不要讓孩子接觸危險物品。

sentences.english: The big boys jumped into the river but little Ned hung back.
sentences.chinese: 大些的男孩子都跳進河裏了，但小內德畏縮不前。
這些勞累的孩子直到7點纔回家。

sentences.english: The nature of the stimulus may predispose some children to attention problems.
sentences.chinese: 刺激本身很可能使一些孩子易產生注意力問題。

sentences.english: Rather he'll say, "It's for the child's own good.
sentences.chinese: 而是說，“這都是爲了孩子好。

sentences.english: When you’re a kid, you cannot go anywhere by yourself.
sentences.chinese: 當你是一個孩子的時候，你不能自己去任何地方。

sentences.english: “My cousin was a good kid, ” she said.
There is no man but feels (ie no man who does not feel) pity for starving children.
sentences.chinese: 沒有人不同情那些嗷嗷待哺的孩子。

sentences.english: The two boys vied with each other for the first place.
sentences.chinese: 那兩個男孩子爭第一名。

sentences.english: Also nobody proof, the child does not recognize the father, the county magistrate worried for a while.
sentences.chinese: 既沒有人證明，孩子也不認爹，縣官一時犯了難。

sentences.english: He raised the child up in order to let him reach the branch.
sentences.chinese: 他將孩子舉高以便讓他夠得着樹枝。

sentences.english: You shouldn't force food on children.
sentences.chinese: 你不應該強迫孩子們喫東西。

sentences.english: He now lives in Germany with his wife Deling and their 2 children.
sentences.chinese: 他與太太得靈及他們的2個孩子目前旅居在德國。

sentences.english: This, it appears, is the legacy I have received and have now bequeathed to my own child.
sentences.chinese: 而這，正是我已收到並留給自己孩子的遺產。

definition: head of a household/family head/patriarch/parent or guardian of a child
a dad (father of a young child)
